data.text:
@barney1776 @stevenmazie I rephrase my comment to say SOME Seals .....
Apology for sweeping generalization.
@stevenmazie My question is.  Do they take other vaccines before joining up and going to active duty.  What’s the difference now
@barney1776 @stevenmazie Thank you for responding. I am to assume then, the Seals are well trained but not too smart nor too honest.

@pjeastman @barney1776 @stevenmazie @Megawatts55 Don’t need a study. Look at the data…elderly, obese, people with co-morbidities. These stories are outliers..akin to athletes who drop dead because of an unknown heart condition. You don’t make policy based on outliers.

@jrberg3 @barney1776 @stevenmazie @Megawatts55 What study can you point to about being so inshape, navel seal in shape not professional athlete In shape will protect you from Covid? What are you talking about?
@sugarpantz @KarenLeidy9 @StrugglingMan2 @stevenmazie Safe is defined as risk.  Those conditions blood clots, carditis, etc are all caused by the virus as well, but worse.

@DJZ3 @barney1776 @stevenmazie @Megawatts55 I don’t understand… they signed up for unlimited vaccinations decided by the chain of command and now they want to be insubordinate? These are the best warriors?

@GOPsickandtired @barney1776 @stevenmazie @Megawatts55 This is really interesting thinking right now. Do you really think it's wise to get rid of best warriors because of a pandemic that didn't threaten them (young) and now has a vaccine? 
Putin must be giggling.
@DJZ3 @barney1776 @stevenmazie @Megawatts55 Because getting vaccinations was part of what they signed up for and  the chain of command says get them?
